title: Textile Fragment
description: Fragment of Nasca mock tapestry with fringe (small fragment of sheer white cloth woven to it at corner). Barely discernable motif of stylized dancing men in red, black, blue, blue/green, gold. Badly deteriorated.   Acc. # 77.77.37 may be part of same piece.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
